page.syntax: L GrantAccess(Name as C, AccessType as C [, Resource as C])
page.description: Grant to a user or group the access specified, optionally, on the resource named.
page.original:
SQL::Connection::GrantAccess() Syntax Result_Flag as L = .GrantAccess( Name as C, AccessType as C [, Resource as C ] ) ArgumentDescription Result_FlagTRUE (.T.) if the operation was successful; otherwise FALSE (.F.). A SQL::Connection object. NameThe name of a user or group. AccessTypeThe type of access to grant. ResourceOptional. The name of a resource to control.
Description The GrantAccess() method grants to a user or group the access specified to the named resource. Limitations See Also SQL::Connection Object
